title: Unable to install from source
body_html:
I followed the steps to install from source on CentOS with Cuda 7.5

The step python setup.py install returns this error:

/gpfsnyu/home/qhv200/pytorch/torch/lib/THPP/tensors/generic/THCTensor.cpp:1643: error: no member function ‘getDevice’ declared in ‘thpp::THCTensor<double>’
/gpfsnyu/home/qhv200/pytorch/torch/lib/THPP/tensors/generic/THCTensor.cpp:1648: error: no member function ‘newTensor’ declared in ‘thpp::THCTensor<double>’
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/THPP.dir/tensors/THCTensor.cpp.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/THPP.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

There were many more errors but these are the last few

body:
I followed the steps to install from source on CentOS with Cuda 7.5

The step `python setup.py install` returns this error:

```
/gpfsnyu/home/qhv200/pytorch/torch/lib/THPP/tensors/generic/THCTensor.cpp:1643: error: no member function ‘getDevice’ declared in ‘thpp::THCTensor<double>’
/gpfsnyu/home/qhv200/pytorch/torch/lib/THPP/tensors/generic/THCTensor.cpp:1648: error: no member function ‘newTensor’ declared in ‘thpp::THCTensor<double>’
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/THPP.dir/tensors/THCTensor.cpp.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/THPP.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

There were many more errors but these are the last few
